text.author: Guardian staff reporter
text.description: The former Italian prime minister will shortly learn his sentence for a tax fraud conviction. Berlusconi is likely to be ordered to undertake community service, possibly caring for old people. Find out what he might look like and why some sentences would be more fitting than others
text.title: Silvio Berlusconi's judgment day – you choose the sentence

main.head: Silvio Berlusconi's judgment day – you choose the sentence
main.p: This article is more than 11 years old
House arrest or community service in a care home? The former Italian prime minister is due to find out in a court hearing beginning on Thursday how he is to serve his one-year sentence for tax fraud.
Dress Berlusconi in a sentence of your choosing and find out why some would be more fitting than others
